column1: Smoque BBQ////Other foods that aren't ribs: after bringing the food home (1 St. Louis full slab with coleslaw
column3: and beans) we were dying to dig in. The Mac n cheese was pretty standard but the crunchy top killed it. Don't even get me started on the coleslaw
column4: completely reminded me of my UIUC days at Joes Burgers. The slaw was delicious and not overbearing. The beans were extraordinarily tasty (I wish I had more!!!) and now for the main course review.
